translated: They cannot be fabricated or changed.

original: chos rnams thams @469b cad mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: chos rnams thams @469b cad mtshan nyid med //
translated: All phenomena are devoid of characteristics.

original: snang ba thams cad dngos med pas //
analyzed: snang ba thams cad dngos med pas //
translated: All appearances are unreal.

original: yod dang med pa thams cad kun //
analyzed: yod dang med pa thams cad kun //
translated: All existence and nonexistence

original: mtshan nyid med pas mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pas mi dmigs so //
translated: Are not observed because they are devoid of characteristics.

original: 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa //
translated: Supramundane and mundaneüîΩPhenomena appear in various ways,

original: chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba dang // bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas //
analyzed: chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba dang // bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas //
translated: But since they are not other than yourself,

original: kun la smon cing chags su med //
analyzed: kun la smon cing chags su med //
translated: Do not aspire to or be attached to anything.

original: byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni //
analyzed: byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni //
translated: All bodhisattvas

original: shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas //
analyzed: shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas //
translated: Since it is extremely difficult to examine and has profound depths,

original: rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin //
analyzed: rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin //
translated: It is not the domain of intellectual analysis.

original: ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med //
analyzed: ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med //
translated: It is not observed, is not non-observed, and is not observable.

original: sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu //
analyzed: sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu //
translated: What is the suchness of the mind itself?

original: byang chub de nyid sems yin no //
analyzed: byang chub de nyid sems yin no //
translated: Awakening is precisely that mind.

original: sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas //
analyzed: sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas //
translated: Since mind and awakening are inseparable,üîΩAll sentient beings without exception

original: sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin //
analyzed: sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin //
translated: And all phenomena of the three times are so.

original: thams cad ma lus chos so cog /
analyzed: thams cad ma lus chos so cog /
translated: All phenomena without exception

original: sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ubs //
analyzed: sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ubs //
translated: Are subsumed within mind and awakening.

original: bo dhi chen pos de skad bshad //
analyzed: bo dhi chen pos de skad bshad //
translated: The great bodhisattvas explain it thus.

original: skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas //
analyzed: skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas //
translated: Those with the utmost mental prowess

original: ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyad //
analyzed: ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyad //
translated: Engage in conduct without any impediment whatsoever.

original: spyad pa nyid na chags pa med //
analyzed: spyad pa nyid na chags pa med //
translated: In that very conduct, there is no attachment.

original: dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas //
analyzed: dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas //
translated: It abides without decline until the end of time.

original: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la //
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la //
translated: In this way, all that appears

original: mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong yang //
analyzed: mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong yang //
translated: Is always seen with direct valid cognition,

original: snang ba nyid na dngos po med //
analyzed: snang ba nyid na dngos po med //
translated: Yet in appearance itself, there are no entities.

original: de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs //
analyzed: de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs //
translated: Realize it to be the same in suchness.

original: gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces //
analyzed: gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces //
translated: If someone asks, ‚ÄúIs it within the state of emptiness?‚Äù

original: med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de //
analyzed: med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de //
translated: The realization of the nature of nonexistence

original: ri bong rva dang mo gsham bu //
analyzed: ri bong rva dang mo gsham bu //
translated: Is like the horns of a rabbit or the child of a barren woman.

original: tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi //üîΩthams cad ming tsam stong nyid med //
analyzed: tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi // thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med //
translated: It is suitable to be merely designated with words.üîΩAll are mere names, empty, and nonexistent.

original: thams cad ma lus stong zhes te /
analyzed: thams cad ma lus stong zhes te /
translated: All without exception are empty.

original: dran med brdos pa ma yin pas //
analyzed: dran med brdos pa ma yin pas //
translated: It is not a non-memory, a non-entity.

original: rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal @470a *//
analyzed: rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal @470a *//
translated: The nature is nonconceptual and luminous.

original: zhing // 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun //
analyzed: zhing // 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun //
translated: In this way, all appearances

original: brdos pa tsam gyi chos med do //
analyzed: brdos pa tsam gyi chos med do //
translated: Are phenomena that are mere imputations.

original: shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o //
analyzed: shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o //
translated: They are only consciousness.

original: thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na //
analyzed: thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na //
translated: When all are realized to be nondual,

original: de nyid don dam dbyings yin te //
analyzed: de nyid don dam dbyings yin te //
translated: That is the ultimate dhƒÅtu.

original: gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med //
analyzed: gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med //
translated: It cannot be sought or established elsewhere.

original: yod las btsal na sgro btags 'gyur //
analyzed: yod las btsal na sgro btags 'gyur //
translated: If it is sought in existence, it is superimposition.

original: med las btsal na skur btab ste //
analyzed: med las btsal na skur btab ste //
translated: If it is sought in nonexistence, it is denigration.

original: yod med gnyis las btsal byas na //
analyzed: yod med gnyis las btsal byas na //

original: de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur //
translated: it is indeterminate.

original: rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste //
translated: It is not conceptualized.

original: de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med //
analyzed: de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med //
translated: There is nothing that it does not know.

original: rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu //
analyzed: rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu //
translated: The view of yoga is like that.

original: tshig gis snga phyi yod mod kyang //
analyzed: tshig gis snga phyi yod mod kyang //
translated: Although the words are sequential,

original: don gyis gcig car rdzogs par bsgom //
analyzed: don gyis gcig car rdzogs par bsgom //
translated: The meaning is complete and simultaneous.

original: de lta bu yi don rtogs kyang //
analyzed: de lta bu yi don rtogs kyang //
translated: Even if one realizes such a meaning,

original: 'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyad kyang //
analyzed: 'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyad kyang //
translated: One may still go, lie down, sit, stay, and enjoy,

original: theg chen sgom las nyams pa mid //üîΩgong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i //
analyzed: theg chen sgom las nyams pa mid // gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i //
translated: But never fall from the meditation of the Mahayana.üîΩThose with inferior minds who do not realize the meaning

original: blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas //
analyzed: blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas //
translated: As explained above,

original: ma rtogs le lo snyom las byas //
analyzed: ma rtogs le lo snyom las byas //
translated: Will not realize and will be lazy and indolent.

original: don ma grub par ngan song 'gro //
analyzed: don ma grub par ngan song 'gro //
translated: Without accomplishing the meaning, they will go to the lower realms.

original: sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na //
analyzed: sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na //
translated: If the mind does not realize equality,üîΩOne will not awaken through the equality of words.

original: tshig gis mnyam pas sangs mi rgya; ;de bas don tshig ldan par byos //
analyzed: tshig gis mnyam pas sangs mi rgya; ;de bas don tshig ldan par byos //

original: 'on tang the tshom med par 'grub //
analyzed: 'on tang the tshom med par 'grub //

original: rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis //

original: dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom //
analyzed: dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom //

original: yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
analyzed: yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //

original: spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du gcig /

original: bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
analyzed: bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //

analyzed: des ni byang chub snying po @470b len; ;zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o // rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /

analyzed: dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////

analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang pa'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag rgyar 'dus shing phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la 'di ltar brtags shing phyag rgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang /

original: dam tshig ni /
analyzed: dam tshig ni /

original: gnas yin no //
analyzed: gnas yin no //

original: gsang ba de nyid kho na las //
analyzed: gsang ba de nyid kho na las //

analyzed: byang chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o //

original: 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun //
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun //

analyzed: ye nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid //

analyzed: mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba min //

analyzed: bdag nyi @471a *//

translated: By this expression, all tathƒÅgatas were delighted to be inseparable and remained in the ornament of the dense array of the spontaneous vast dimension of the body, speech, and mind of the equality of the four times.

analyzed: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //

analyzed: khong na gnas pa'i yang khong na //

analyzed: yi ge kun la mi snang zhing //

analyzed: dper na seng+ge'i 'o ma ni //

original: gser las gyur pa rdul tsam med //
analyzed: gser las gyur pa rdul tsam med //

analyzed: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
